resources.string: The widget needs to know your location to calculate the position of the Sun.\n\nIt works best if you allow precise location at the next step.
To display up-to-date information about the Sun on the home screen, the widget needs access to your location all the time.\n\nPlease select the “%1$s” option in the next screen.
Please enable your device Location in the Settings app by tapping here. After coming back, wait a moment to allow the system to figure things out.
Widget can not calculate the location of the sun, you must allow precise location permission in the app settings.

Sometimes home screen widget updates happen while there\'s another app running and the widget is not visible.\nPlease allow access to the precise location permission in the app Settings using the “%1$s“ option by tapping here.
The widget needs to know where you are, however due to performance reasons it will not request a location. Please open Maps or other app that shows your location.
